heading: Offering
information: Here you find the offering for your plan.

success.title: Offer Runway Added
success.description: You have successfully added new offer runway.

error.title: Offer Runway not Added
error.description: Error occured while adding new offer runway.

edit.heading: Edit
edit.confirm subheading: Editing of a handed in request
edit.confirmation text: You are about to edit an already submitted Offer Runway. By editing, the status of this price definition will be reset to draft. The approval request will be closed, and you will need to resubmit your new draft.
edit.confirmation question: Do you want to proceed with editing?

successMessages.offerEdited desc: You have successfully edited the offer runway.

errorMessages.offerEdited desc: Error occured while editing the offer runway.

modal.heading: Information
modal.description: You are about to confirm a handed in Offering Definition. Do you wnat to proceed?

toast.title: Offering Definition Approved
toast.description: You successfully confirmed the offering definition

modal.heading: Warning
modal.description: You are about to reject a handed in Offering Definition. Please add a little note for your colleagues so they know what to change.

toast.title: Offering Definition Rejected
toast.description: You successfully rejected the offering definition

error.description: Can not request offering approval at the moment
